jd: From: Srinath, IT Strategies srinath@itstrategiesinc.com Reply to: srinath@itstrategiesinc.com Job Title: AWS Python DeveloperLocation: Chicago, IL / Plano, TX(Day1 Onsite)Duration: 6 months Contract Primary Skills:• Programming Languages:o Proficiency in Pythono Experience with tool development and integration using these languages• GitHub Integration:o Experience with integrating tools and applications with GitHubo Understanding of GitHub APIs and workflows Secondary Skills:• Web Development:o Familiarity with web frameworks and development practices in Pythono Knowledge of API development and RESTful services• Testing and Debugging:o Strong debugging and troubleshooting skillso Experience with unit testing and test automation Roles and Responsibilities:• Develop and maintain tools and applications using Python• Integrate tools and applications with GitHub for seamless workflows• Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code• Debug and troubleshoot issues in the developed applications• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software
